text: {"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"1","subject":"ITEM 1: check/detect共通CSS → styles.css抽出 (~200行削減)","description":"check.htmlとdetect.htmlの`<style>`タグから共通CSSルールを特定し、styles.cssの末尾に`/* === Check/Detect共通 === */`セクションとして追加。両HTMLから重複CSSを削除。対象: `.input-panel`, `.input-row`, `.input-group`, `.auth-status-bar`, `.confidence-*`等","assignedBy":"fe-worker","timestamp":"2026-02-09T10:26:36.901Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"2","subject":"ITEM 2: サイトコード設定 → config.js集約 (~40行削減)","description":"config.jsにSITE_CODES配列を追加。check.htmlとdetect.htmlのselect optionsをJS動的生成に変更。check_common.jsにrenderSiteCodeDropdown(selectId)ヘルパーを追加。","assignedBy":"fe-worker","timestamp":"2026-02-09T10:30:22.709Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"5","subject":"ITEM 5: auto.html デッドゲッター関数削除 (~60行削減)","description":"auto.html内のデッドゲッター関数(getPersonTypeResult(), getYudoRecommendResult()等)をGrep検索で使用状況確認し、未使用関数を削除。","assignedBy":"fe-worker","timestamp":"2026-02-09T10:32:55.509Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"7","subject":"ITEM 7: script.js 未使用関数削除 (~30行削減)","description":"script.jsの全エクスポート関数をリスト化。Grepで各関数のHTML/JS内呼び出しを検索。呼び出し元がゼロの関数を削除。","assignedBy":"fe-worker","timestamp":"2026-02-09T10:34:14.125Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"6","subject":"ITEM 6: check/detect共通フォームJS → check_common.js拡張 (~80行削減)","description":"両HTMLのフォーム値取得・URL構築ロジックをcheck_common.jsにgetCheckFormValues()として集約。/api/check/urls呼び出しも共通化。両HTMLからインラインの重複JSを削除。","assignedBy":"fe-worker","timestamp":"2026-02-09T10:35:19.502Z"}
